title: Add Subtract and Multiply functions
description:
Extend internal/calculator/calc.go with:
- Subtract(a, b int) int - returns a minus b
- Multiply(a, b int) int - returns a times b

Each function should have a doc comment.

Run: go build ./internal/calculator/...
closed_reason: Added Subtract and Multiply functions to internal/calculator/calc.go with doc comments. Build passes.
